q: What happens when I buy GOS?
a: When you buy GOS, your USDT gets locked into the USDT GOS smart contract and rewards you with 8% daily return every day.

q: Can I take my initial USDT back?
a: Over Time! GOS are not bought, GOS are mined therefore they can't be sold. Once GOS are mined they work for you indefinitely, providing you with an unlimited amount of USDT at a starting rate of 8% daily.
There is a small 3% dev fee in order to pay for marketing costs and developing the USDT GOS ecosystem.

q: When is the best time to buy GOS?
a: Always! No matter when you hire miners, you will begin with a return rate of 8% daily.
WE recommend that you compound at least once per day but you are free to do so as often as you wish.

GOS are sustained by continued community support, just as every other crypto coin, token or project. The difference is that since there is no token, there is no price to dump. As long as GOS are mining in the contract, there will be rewards!

q: How to use GOS on my phone?
a: You can either use an app with a dapp browser and choose the Metamask/Injected option or simply use any browser that you want and choose WalletConnect to connect to your wallet's app on your phone.

q: Is it better to Compound or Harvest?
a: By design, compounding will be more profitable than Harvesting in the long-term.

Once your BSC wallet is connected to the USDT Miner website, you will notice your referral address appear at the bottom of the page. When a new user hires miners after clicking your personal referral link, the contract will send a USDT value equal to 8% instantly to your USDT GOS. Be smart, use it to buy GOS and build yourself a stream of income.
